## Installation

`gggibbous` is not yet on CRAN, so the easiest way to install it is with the `devtools` package:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("mnbram/gggibbous")
```

